title: Monkeys, apes and man: exploring the chasm
creator_credit: National Geographic Society, Wolper Productions and Jeff Myrow
brief_description: Explains how studies of primate social organisation, use and manufacture of tools, ability to learn, and socialisation, have shown that the similarity between monkeys and humans is not superficial.
